ARGUMENT
x

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | ofcfval.1 | |- ( ph -> F Fn A ) |
| 2 |  | ofcfval.2 | |- ( ph -> A e. V ) |
| 3 |  | ofcfval.3 | |- ( ph -> C e. W ) |
| 4 |  | #P_ovex | |- ( ( F ` x ) R C ) e. _V |
| 5 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( x e. A |-> ( ( F ` x ) R C ) ) = ( x e. A |-> ( ( F ` x ) R C ) ) |
| 6 | 4, 5 | #P_fnmpti | |- ( x e. A |-> ( ( F ` x ) R C ) ) Fn A |
| 7 |  | #P_eqidd | |- ( ( ph /\ x e. A ) -> ( F ` x ) = ( F ` x ) ) |
| 8 | 1, 2, 3, 7 | #P_ofcfval | |- ( ph -> ( F oFC R C ) = ( x e. A |-> ( ( F ` x ) R C ) ) ) |
| 9 | 8 | #P_fneq1d | |- ( ph -> ( ( F oFC R C ) Fn A <-> ( x e. A |-> ( ( F ` x ) R C ) ) Fn A ) ) |
| 10 | 6, 9 | #P_mpbiri | |- ( ph -> ( F oFC R C ) Fn A ) |
